title: Can You Watch Netflix on FaceTime? 3 Ways to Watch Together

steps.title: Unfortunately, Netflix does not support FaceTime.
steps.content: Unfortunately, Netflix does not support FaceTime. FaceTime uses SharePlay to share streaming apps, but Netflix is not one of those apps. Hopefully, Netflix will join apps like Max, Hulu, and Disney+ in supporting FaceTime so you can stream your favorite Netflix hits with friends.

steps.title: You can stream movies, TV shows, sports games, and more over FaceTime using several other apps.
steps.content: You can stream movies, TV shows, sports games, and more over FaceTime using several other apps. The following is a list of streaming video, audio, games, social media, and real estate apps that support SharePlay on FaceTime: TV, Movies, & Sports Apple TV+ Digital Concert Hall Disney+ ESPN+ Max Hulu MUBI NBA: Live Games & Scores Pantaya Paramount+ Pluto TV Share+: YouTube on SharePlay SHOWTIME Shudder STARZ UFC Music, Podcasts, & Meditation Apple Music Better Sleep Meditation Moments Moon FM SoundCloud Spotify TuneIn Radio Unplug: Meditation Vinyls Games Guessing Game for SharePlay Heads Up! steps.title: If the movie or show you want to watch is only available on Netflix, you can use a different platform to stream it.
steps.content: If the movie or show you want to watch is only available on Netflix, you can use a different platform to stream it. There are a number of apps that allow you to watch Netflix with your friends online . Watch Netflix Together , Teleparty , Scener, TwoSeven , and MetaStream are web browser extensions that you can install on Google Chrome or Microsoft Edge. Many of these services also offer other streaming platforms, like Hulu and Prime Video. Rave.io is a free app available for Windows, macOS, Android, iPhone, and iPad that lets you stream Netflix, YouTube, and other platforms in sync with friends. Hearo is another platform you can use to stream Netflix and other platforms with friends, and it has apps for Windows, Android, and iPhone. Unfortunately, you can't use Hearo if you have a Mac. You can even host watch parties on Discord , which doesn't require other people to have a subscription to Netflix. Some of these apps are free to use, and some require a paid subscription. You can check them out and see which ones work best for you.

steps.title: Make sure you have the latest version of iOS.
steps.content: Make sure you have the latest version of iOS. SharePlay was a feature that was introduced with iOS 15. If you have not done so, go ahead and update your iPhone or iPad to the latest version before you get started.

steps.title: Start a FaceTime call.
steps.content: Start a FaceTime call. If you want to stream something from a subscription service like Hulu, Apple Music, or Disney+, you'll only be able to do so if everyone on the call also has a subscription to the service. Use the following steps to start a FaceTime call: [1] X Research source Open the FaceTime App. Tap New FaceTime . Tap the contact(s) you want to FaceTime with. Tap the icon that resembles a video camera next to a contact's name.

steps.title: Swipe up from the bottom of the screen.
steps.content: Swipe up from the bottom of the screen. This will take you to your Home screen while in a FaceTime call. [2] X Research source If your iPhone or iPad has a Home button below the screen, you can press the Home button to return to your Home screen.

steps.title: Open a streaming app that supports SharePlay.
steps.content: Open a streaming app that supports SharePlay. Streaming apps that support SharePlay include Apple TV, Disney+, Hulu, Max, STARZ, SHOWTIME, Paramount+, and more. Unfortunately, Netflix does not support SharePlay. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Select a movie or series to watch.
steps.content: Select a movie or series to watch. Just tap the movie or series you want to watch over SharePlay. Then tap the option to start playing the video. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Tap SharePlay.
steps.content: Tap SharePlay . You will most likely see the prompt that says "SharePlay" at the top. Tap this option to start sharing over SharePlay. Everyone in the FaceTime call will have access to the playback controls. [5] X Research source If you don't see the SharePlay tab at the top, tap the Share icon. It's the icon that resembles a box with an arrow pointing up in the upper-right corner. Then tap SharePlay in the Share menu.
